Description: The author of the resource; preferably use an ORCID ID, GitHub profile link, etc., if available and a text name if not.
Citation (e.g. doi) that usage of data or resource should be cited with.
URL to any documentation describing the resource and its use.
Link to a license or name of license applicable for the resource.
Runtime platform or script interpreter dependencies (e.g. Java v1, Python 2.3).
